Html:
Apologies if this was the wrong place -- didn't know if I should make a discussion or an issue for a feature suggestions.

I would love a feature when you can cancel and optimization and get the best gear set so far. I have occasionally run into a situation where I have started a long (ctrl-click) optimization, and don't have time to let it finish, but already it is significantly higher than my best existing gear set. Such a feature would at least let me 1) use the better set until I have time for a full run and 2) see if there's any obvious difference I can make use of in preparing shorter optimizations.

The ability to pause and see the best so far would also be useful, so that you can make sure it's not doing something obviously wrong (because you forgot to add/remove a piece, say) without losing your place.

Thanks for an awesome tool!

-puk
This discussion has been copied to a work item. Click here to go to the work item and continue the discussion.
